alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 6:14AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 613 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Islandton, or 11 miles east of Hampton, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Walterboro, Saint George, Givhans Ferry State Park, Dorchester, Ridgeville, Harleyville, Williams, and Islandton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
